name: Seen (itch) (NanOxidium, Maerys, Skibidip, Nillan)
description:
Trigger warning : This is a horror game, it may not suits to people uncomfortable with the genre !

Try to reach the end of this strange world in which a monstruous immaterial entity is chasing you.

If it sees you, it is the end... You will have to be very, very careful.

Good luck, little one.

Controls :

Z/Q/S/D or Arrow keys : Move up, left, down, right

Mouse : Orient your flashlight

(Put the game in fullscreen to better appreciate the control of the flashlight !)

Credits

Game created for the ZenoJam 4.

Programmer : Nano

Level design : Maerys

Music/sound design : Nillan

Graphisms : Skibidip
